title: Babygirl Video Highlights Nicole Kidman’s Character in A24 Movie

siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: A24 has shared a new Babygirl video for the upcoming erotic thriller, featuring Oscar winner Nicole Kidman as Romy and Harris Dickinson as Samuel. The film is slated to arrive in theaters on December 25. “A high-powered CEO puts her career and family on the line when she begins a torrid affair with her much younger intern,” reads the synopsis. Check out the Babygirl video below (watch more trailers): What happens in the Babygirl video? The video features Kidman and director Halina Reijn discussing the Oscar-winning actress’ character Romy, who begins a love affair with a young intern. Kidman also revealed what drew her to signing onto the movie, admitting that after reading the script she was immediately obsessed with how the character was portrayed in the story. Babygirl is written and directed by Bodies Bodies Bodies filmmaker Halina Reijn. The film is also produced by Reijn along with David Hinojosa and Julia Oh. The ensemble cast also includes Antonio Banderas, Esther McGregor, Vaughan Reilly, Sophie Wilde, Gaite Jansen, Izabel Mar, Victor Slezak, Anoop Desai, Leslie Silva, Maxwell Whittington-Cooper, and more. During its world premiere at the Venice International Film Festival, Kidman won the Volpi Cup for Best Actress. Besides Babygirl, Kidman will also next be seen in the thriller movie Welcome to Holland with Gael Garcia Bernal and in the long-awaited Practical Magic sequel with Sandra Bollock. She’s also set to star in a few major TV projects, including Scarpetta with Jamie Lee Curtis and Margo’s Got Money Troubles with Michelle Pfeiffer.
html:
A24 has shared a new Babygirl video for the upcoming erotic thriller, featuring Oscar winner Nicole Kidman as Romy and Harris Dickinson as Samuel. The film is slated to arrive in theaters on December 25.

“A high-powered CEO puts her career and family on the line when she begins a torrid affair with her much younger intern,” reads the synopsis.

Check out the Babygirl video below (watch more trailers):

What happens in the Babygirl video?

The video features Kidman and director Halina Reijn discussing the Oscar-winning actress’ character Romy, who begins a love affair with a young intern. Kidman also revealed what drew her to signing onto the movie, admitting that after reading the script she was immediately obsessed with how the character was portrayed in the story.

Babygirl is written and directed by Bodies Bodies Bodies filmmaker Halina Reijn. The film is also produced by Reijn along with David Hinojosa and Julia Oh. The ensemble cast also includes Antonio Banderas, Esther McGregor, Vaughan Reilly, Sophie Wilde, Gaite Jansen, Izabel Mar, Victor Slezak, Anoop Desai, Leslie Silva, Maxwell Whittington-Cooper, and more. During its world premiere at the Venice International Film Festival, Kidman won the Volpi Cup for Best Actress.

Besides Babygirl, Kidman will also next be seen in the thriller movie Welcome to Holland with Gael Garcia Bernal and in the long-awaited Practical Magic sequel with Sandra Bollock. She’s also set to star in a few major TV projects, including Scarpetta with Jamie Lee Curtis and Margo’s Got Money Troubles with Michelle Pfeiffer.
